name: Osteoblasts
summary:
In Osteoblasts, you play as a spooky scary skeleton raised from the dead by a mysterious Cat Witch in a journey to find purpose. You get to choose a class and go on frightening adventures battling your nemesis - the Dogs - who unburied you from the depths below. 
 
You'll be faced with various quests, meet friendly skeletons, travel to spine-tingling dungeons and fight monsters to get stronger. The entire world has class-specific quests and several randomized elements that will change as you visit them again. But beware - as a sinister skeleton wandering about, not everyone will accept you. The dead aren't as welcome as they should and it's not even halloween yet.

name: OshiRabu: Waifus Over Husbandos - Love or Die
summary:
The distant sound of bells chime through a pure white chapel...
She never thought it would happen to her,
but this is even more than she dreamed of...

name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: A Guerra Galáctica
summary: A simple but fun game focused on the Galactic War, where you can choose between the 10 Bronze Saints who participated in the tournament. Other scenarios are also available, but in versus or training mode.

name: Ossuary
summary: Fall into the place of bones. Urge on the stagnant residents who are lost to corrupt virtue. Use sins as your tools to improve their existence. Expose the cabbages pretending to be people. Learn about the razor blades hidden in your walls.

name: Osmozys
summary:
You are a little green ball and through 5 levels, you have to collect all the blue diamonds. Beware of the red enemies and the level empty borders!

Homebrew puzzle game demo released for the Jagcode II contest.

name: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan
summary: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan, or simply Ouendan, is a rhythm video game developed by iNiS and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS handheld game console in 2005, for release only in Japan. Ouendan stars a cheer squad rhythmically cheering for various troubled people, presented in game in the style of a manga comic. In each stage, players use the DS touchscreen to tap specifically marked spots that appear in rhythm to various Japanese pop songs, scoring points for accurate timing and avoiding a poor performance which can cause the stage to end prematurely. Though never released in Western markets, it was a popular import to these regions, leading to the development of the Westernized spiritual sequel Elite Beat Agents, as well as a direct Japanese sequel Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2.

name: Osyaberi! Horijyo! Holin Slash
summary: Anna Holinski embarks on a relic thievery investigation, unearthing all kinds of ores and valuables to upgrade her equipment. Her attack power, jumps, energy, and other stats will get stronger with each upgrade. The game's difficulty is balanced so that anyone can clear it through replaying and upgrading equipment, so if you find yourself between a rock and a hard place, upgrades are the way to go! Of course, an "Osyaberi!" game would be incomplete without tons of fully voiced content, and this one is no exception! Even the new characters like the leader of a mysterious organization "Collector Jean", the equipment upgrading shopkeeper "Inari", and more will come to life with fully voiced interactions!

name: Osawari Tantei Ozawa Rina: Nameko Rhythm
summary: A dancing game based on the Touch Detective series.

name: OS Omega
summary: OS OMEGA is an action-adventure game set in a hostile operating system environment. You are Binary Boy (a character made of ones and zeros) and your goal is to defeat the super-villain - the virus that wants to format your C drive.

name: Osiris: New Dawn
summary: Osiris: New Dawn is an unforgiving near future space survival game with a cinematic feel and elements of horror. Play as a Mission Specialist in single or multiplayer to build your planetary base, pilotable vehicles, and controllable drones as you explore a dangerous solar system far from Earth.

name: Oshinui Tune
summary:
Nothing happened... it was just an ordinary OshiNui... or so you thought.

A uniquely designed STG (shoot 'em up) filled with charming pixel art and catchy chiptune music, made for fans of both! Bushinui, Ashinui, Kashinui… How many different plushie-favorites can you discover? What's the truth behind the rumor that you can meet your Oshi!?

name: Osman Ghazi: Ottoman Rising
summary: A third-person action adventure set in 13th-century Anatolia. Rise as Osman Gazi, hunt, fight, infiltrate enemy strongholds, and forge the foundations of an empire. Explore a vast historical world shaped by conquest, betrayal, and the birth of a legend.

name: Osomatsu-san Protagonist Contest Pokoball
summary:
Iyami and the others have come to steal the hero's seat! Throw a bouncy ball and fight against it!

Just decide the angle to throw the ball and release it! Throw the ball and attack it!
If you throw it aiming at the gap between the wall and the enemy, you can hit continuously and deal a lot of damage!

Of course, familiar members such as Totoko, Dekapan, Chibita, Hatabo and Dayon,
Oil King, Kamimatsu, and that character and that character
In addition, that character and that character will also appear in total over 100 bodies!

name: Osyaberi! Puzzle Chigatan: Spot the Differences with Everyone
summary: Up to 4 players can play! Crank the fun up to eleven with this spot the difference extravaganza! Enjoy non-stop dialogue every time you play! Many characters from the “Osyaberi” games make their appearance! The “Chigatan” game that anyone and everyone will enjoy playing, whether alone or with family! Time to test your brain by spotting the differences!

name: Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall
summary: The confrontation between the East and the West is coming to an end, but not between East and West Germany. The old party leaders are still sitting in their offices, not changing anything and waiting for exclamations from Moscow. But their end is close – Gorbachev and Kohl have already decided...

name: Ostera: The curse of...
summary: Immerse yourself in Ostera: The curse of..., a hilarious narrative game where magic goes as haywire as your villagers! Set in an absurdly humorous medieval-steampunk world, take on the role of a village chief desperate to lift a curse and save his people from impending disaster.

name: Osman
summary:
It is the late 21st century, and the world has come under the control of a single federal government. One day a new threat known as Abdullah the Slaver appears, causing widespread terror and panic. The fear in men's hearts incites the abandonment of all economic activity. The federal government, which is the foundation of capitalism and modern civilization, has become nothing less than an insidious idea that corrupts the foundations of society itself. It destroys the idiosyncrasies and variations among national viewpoints, stifling them in the name of "freedom" and its own internal ideals.

Judicial Affairs Director Jack Layzon alone grasps the situation, fearing the worst. He summons the lone assassin who had mastered the 'secret style'...

name: Osomatsu-san: Hesokuri Wars
summary:
Osomatsu-San: Hesokuri Wars was a Tower Defense strategy game based around the anime Osomatsu-San on both android and iOS. It was released in Japan in 2016, and continued to receive updates until October 2nd, 2022 when the game finally reached end of service.

The game featured gacha elements in exchange for units to defend the Matsuno home, and also had an area for your own Osomatsu themed amusement park! At the amusement park, you could gachapon for unique housing units from the set of Osomatsu-san, and receive bonuses in each stage as you progressed.

name: Osher Bli Gvulot
summary:
Osher Bli Gvulot is the first full-length Israeli adventure game created with AGS. It contains 10 hours of gameplay with 2 hours of original music and voice speech. The game's hero is Osher, a 30-yo Israeli guy trying to get elected as Israel's next prime minister.

The game is offered for free, it does not require installation or registration, and is expected to work on any computer.

name: Ostriv
summary:
Ostriv is a city-building game that puts you in a role of a governor of an 18th century Ukrainian town to challenge your creative skills and management abilities. 
 
Ostriv aims to raise the bar of city-building experience by adding a huge amount of possibilities and removing annoying limitations. It allows for truly organic town layouts without the grid and angle restrictions on a three-dimensional landscape. The goal is to make player's creations to become alive and believable communities where real-life problems would arise, thus making the late game a new challenge rather than a repetitive chore.

name: Ospesjel
summary: A short story about the soul of a book making a five-year pact with a trickster spirit to turn her into a human. The five years are almost up, and as she slowly turns back into a novel, she returns to the spirit to beg it to keep her human by any means necessary.

name: Ostrich Island
summary: The game is the unique adventure/exploration/RPG mix where you are playing as an Ostrich! Walk into tropical paradise, rush through storm madness, explore the deepness of the ocean and behold the darkness of underground. Each island contains many secret achievements, collectibles and bonuses needed to be discovered.

name: Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Cute ni Oshare
summary:
Oshare Majo: Love and Berry CUTE Ni Oshare is a game for the Advanced Pico Beena in Japan only. This game focuses on fashion, puzzles, and rhythm minigames compared to the other Love and Berry series Advanced Pico Beena release Chiiku Drill Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Moji Kazu Chie Asobi, which focuses more on solving equations.

Despite the game featuring the songs in MIDI format, it also features the vocal version of ABCD Everything's Okay!

name: Osomatsu-kun: Back to the Me no Deppa no Maki
summary:
The second game based on the Osomatsu-kun anime and manga, released in 1989 for Famicom.

Osomatsu-kun: Back to the Me no Deppa no Maki is an Adventure game, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai Shinsei, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Ostranauts
summary:
Ostranauts is a detailed simulation of owning and living aboard a spaceship, in a solar system where honest living is a slow death sentence. Set in the NEO Scavenger universe, where Earth has suffered cataclysmic collapse, the rest of the System lives on in a state of capitalistic dystopia.

Players will create their captain, build or customize their starting ship from the spoils of their career history, and find ways to keep fuel in their tanks, food on their plates, and the debt collectors at bay.

name: Oscar
summary: Your name is Oscar. You have to run and jump through 7 Levels in Hollywood-style (Science Fiction, Western, Horror, Cartoons, Dino, Detective and Gameshow) to find Oscars (yes – the Academy Award!).

name: Osu!! Karate Bu
summary:
A Super Famicom fighter game based on the delinquent martial arts manga of the same name. It was developed and published by Culture Brain in 1994.

The game is a standard martial arts one-on-one fighter in most respects, though features a few uncommon aspects. The first of which is that the player's health bar does not replenish after each round, and the fight continues as each bar is depleted. The second is that the player can recover from losing all their health if they have enough on their power (or qi) gauge. The game counts to three, like in professional wrestling, and the player has the chance to recover a small amount of health in exchange for their power.

name: Osiris
summary:
OSIRIS Total Conversion is the much-expanded sequel to I, ANUBIS (a DOOMGATE "Best Doom2 of all time" level). OSIRIS makes that one look like pac-man.

OSIRIS contains incredible new monsters, textures, graphics, and sounds (326 new sprites!). Loosely (very loosely) based on the movie "STARGATE". Designed to be DIFFICULT, with serious thought applied to gameplay, lighting, architecture, immersion, and theme.

Gameplay will be best on ULTRAVIOLENT in single-player or co-op modes. Provision for deathmatch is not included. OSIRIS is NOT so huge as to slow your machine to a crawl, but faster machines will, of course, play better.

name: Oscuro Blossom's Glow
summary: Join Selene in a charming platforming and puzzle adventure, where her ability to absorb and emit light from various flowers is key to activating mechanisms, overcoming obstacles, and navigating through environments that adjust depending on how you wield the light.

name: Osk
summary: A Squirrel rages through the end of its dying world in this chaotic depiction of the beginning and the end.

name: Osmorrow
summary: An adventure set on the planet of Osmorrow, where the Ogre clan has run rampant. Your mission is to help restore peace and order to this world as you liberate Osmorrow from the Ogre oppression. Use high skilled melee and ranged combat along with swift and precise movement to quell the Ogre threat.

name: Osu!
summary: Osu! is a freeware rhythm game originally for Microsoft Windows. It is written in C# on the .NET Framework and inspired by Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan.

name: Oshi no Ko Puzzle
summary: An upcoming puzzle game based on the Oshi no Ko anime series.

name: Ostrich Runner
summary: Ostrich Runner – is the fascinating animated arcade racing where the main heroes are funny and a little bit crazy ostriches.

name: Oscar in Movieland
summary: A remake of the 1993 game "Oscar".

name: Osmos
summary: Enter the ambient world of Osmos: elegant, physics-based gameplay, dreamlike visuals, and a minimalist, electronic soundtrack. Your objective is to grow by absorbing other motes. Propel yourself by ejecting matter behind you. But be wise: ejecting matter also shrinks you. Relax - good things come to those who wait.

name: Oscar the Ballonist flies into the Mountains
Oshi to Hanaseru! Hangul Kiso Phrase
OSD vs RON
summary: A Rock-Paper-Scissors game created by Ponch as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Osananajimi no Onee-chan wa Senzoku Maid!: Natsuyasumi Dousei Seikatsu
summary: Hideo dreams of living together with Sion and having sex with her all day long. Of course, Sion quite adamantly denies him his dream, but...... Somewhere down the road her shouting becomes mixed with moans of ecstasy.

name: Ostallian Core
summary: A modern omnidirectional space shooter with colorful retro-style ASCII art and light RPG elements, featuring optional permadeath.

name: Oscuria: The World of Nightmares
summary: There is another world, darker, more frightening. A world that is about to be completely invaded by nightmares. Zeyk and his friends find themselves by chance in this parallel reality in which they will have to face their greatest fears to prevent the unchallenged domination of nightmares.

name: Osternfield
summary: Little point and click adventure with easter bunnys.

name: Oscillation
summary: 9 boom compatible maps of increasing difficulty

name: Osmar: A Primeira Fatia do Pão-de-fôrma
summary: Have you ever thought about how the first slice of bread feels? That's right, the one nobody eats, the one they always leave aside! That's what you'll discover in this exciting story: Osmar, the first slice of bread, and his friend Cookie are on a mission to find the box of candies.

name: Oses
summary: Command 3 characters and use strategy to survive on this post-apocalyptic shooter.

name: O-Sim 22
summary: An orienteering simulator for all runners who want to test their skills digitally and for those who want to try the sport once.

name: Osozaki: Late Blooming - First
summary: Late Blooming is a romantic comedy about drama and tragedy set in Thais, a quiet little town lost in the world. You will have to play the role of the protagonist, an ordinary young man whose life has given him a second chance. Your mission will be to guide the protagonist in his decisions, and figure out the mysteries that hide inside the hearts of the three girls.

name: Oscar the Balloonist: My Creative Workshop
Oscar the Ballonist & The Secrets of the Forest
Oshi no Ko Quiz
summary: A fanmade quiz game based on the manga and anime Oshi no Ko. In the game you're asked questions about characters and story.

name: Osiris
summary: Osiris is a Roguelike Dark Fantasy game that thells a Story of a demigod who wants to escape the Egyptian underworld to save his beloved woman who was doomed to lose her soul forever.

name: Osomatsu-san: Matsumatsuri!
summary: Help one of the sextuplets rise to popularity as you win more minigames. The more you win, the more illustrations, voice clips, and backgrounds you can unlock. You can then use these to create your very own Osomatsu-san scenes!

name: OS:Memories
summary: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiousity. Understand what happened to Andyby browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS:Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

name: Osomatsu-san Hesokuri Wars: Battle of the NEETs
summary: The sextuplets head out in a variety of costumes with their friends to defeat enemies and steal everyone’s secret stash of cash! Full of gags, over-the-top action, and fast-paced battles!

name: OshiIro
summary: Swing your glowstick and exorcise! A new kind of horror game!

name: OS: Memories
summary: OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer. It offers an immersive experience through an old computer interface, allowing players to relive Andy's life story and uncover his deepest deadlocks. The game includes puzzles that provide insights into difficult situations and encourages players to explore Andy's personal archives and memories.

name: Oscillate
summary: Start your racing career by enjoying the beauty of speeding, rushing & darting with your friends in versus mode or in a fun online multiplayer. You can also go solo if you want to. Are you ready to rush around the globe?

name: Ostrich Farm
summary: Sunshine graces the farm and your birds are a fashion disaster. Breed vibrant ostriches by matching colors and patterns to complete unique orders. Earn valuable rewards and mutation points to enhance your farm's genetic diversity.

name: Oscar's Paradise
summary: Oscar's Paradise is a fast paced marble game where you must rush to the end while collecting Oscar's scraps.

name: Oshare Beena: o-Mise de Kisekae Make Haircut
Oscura: Lost Light
summary: Oscura, the apprentice lighthouse keeper, has destroyed the Aurora Stone, sending shards across the Driftlands and plunging them into darkness and danger. It’s up to Oscura to find the shards of the stone and restore light to the Driftlands before creatures of the dark can destroy it.

name: Ostrich Run
summary: Ostrich Run is a game where you guide a horde of ostriches out of a lab. Take every ostrich you can and avoid the multiple hazards on your way out. The ostriches will help you break harder windows and rescue more ostriches. Make sure to save them all!

name: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency
summary: Oscillatron: Alien Frequency - music arcade in space! You have to control the spaceship and destroy the alien troops, and music will be your weapon!

name: O-SHI-KA-KE Saiminjutsushi: Toraware no In'yoku Marionette
O! Strelalka!!!
summary: Near space, the future, 2020. Sudden attack of aliens destroyed the house, everywhere malicious enemy ships, you jump into your combat spaceship and ahead to destroy the invaders. Your task is to destroy all ships and be saved. Stars like brave men!

name: Oswald's Adventure
summary: Follow Oswald in his adventure to find his sister. Will he find her? Or is there a surprise waiting for him? There is only one way to find out! Good luck, adventurers.

name: Osmo Newton
summary: Solve creative physics puzzles by drawing lines or placing items in front of the screen.

name: Oshare Princess DS: Oshare ni Koi Shite 2
Ostalgie: Disorder in Yugoslavia
summary: Yugoslavia is moving towards the Soviet Union, only with much deeper problems and the outcome will be much more bloody. But can the Party survive? Or will it be swept away by the forces of decay? Will the country be saved by the new socialism or the old Marxism, or by a completely non-socialist?

name: Oshare Majo: Love and Berry DS Collection
summary: Nintendo DS port of the fashion and rhythm arcade game by Sega. The game features collectible cards and requires a Sega card reader to scan the cards.

name: Osmo Numbers
summary: Add, count & multiply tiles to pop the number bubbles. Popping enough will free  fish & unleash a lightning storm! Learn to be the numbers master.

name: Ostalgie: Fall of the Curtain
summary: The Cold War is coming to an end, and "cradles of the revolution" join the fight for their existence in the system of new world order. But does everyone need the changes?..

name: Oshare Princess 3
summary: Oshare Princess 3 is an Adventure game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: OshiRabu: Waifus Over Husbandos
summary: "—I wanna marry you." Those simple words set in motion a ♀ yuri ♀ game of cat and mouse!

name: Oscarzinho e o Bug do Esporte
summary:
Oscarzinho e o Bug do Esporte is a kids' adventure game where Oscarzinho, based on the Brazilian basketball player Oscar Schmidt, and his friends need to deal with a group named Drugs that have infested the planet with a computer virus and wiped out all memory of sports and to revert this situation, they will challenge the Drugs until they manage to make all sports practiced again.

The game aims to encourage the practice of sports, teach citizenship notions, show the dangers of drug use, and develop the player's creative potential and motor coordination.

name: Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall - Legacy of Hoxha
summary: The world is changing, but Albania is not. The covenants of Enver Hoxha are honored with all responsibility and authority. But how long will this last in the world of the end of the Cold War? Albanian Gorbachev, Islamic socialism or still aligned to Hoxha? So many ways... And the choice is in your hands.

name: Osu!Stream
summary: Osu!Stream is a rhythm game made for touch-enabled devices, with 45 playable songs and new gameplay elements.

name: Osu!Octave
summary: Osu!Octave is a free and open source rhythm game designed to play Osu! Standard beatmaps, optimized for best performance and playability on PlayStation Vita.

name: O Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: As Reinações de Narizinho
summary: Children's game about the story "As Reinações de Narizinho" by the Brazilian writer Monteiro Lobato.

name: Oscar the Balloonist Discovers the Farm
summary: Oscar is exploring the world and explores the farmland to discover and learn about animals and living on a farm.

name: Ostrich Among Us
summary: You are an ostrich, stumbled into a dancing group. With zero dancing skill, you try to keep up with the gang: watch and learn what everyone else does, wait for your turn, then do exactly the same! Keep dancing to attract your audience, the more fans you have, the more money you will earn.

name: Oshare de Kawaii Koinu to Asobo!: Machi-hen
Ostrova Koshki
summary: Action platformer about teenage issues in primitive world

name: Oshaberi Inko Club
summary: Oshaberi Inko Club is a Strategy game, published by Alpha Unit, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Osseous and Swordy
summary: Osseous And Swordy is a 2D game that tasks players with outlasting an ever-evolving horde of monsters. With the coins falling from each enemy you kill, you can strengthen your sword, your health bar or your shield. Can you reach the last level and finish the game in this hellish game to play?

name: Oscar the Balloonist: Discovers the Farm
Osomatsu-kun Hachamecha Gekijou
summary: The game was based on the Manga/Anime series Osomatsu-kun by Fujio Akatsuka; players controlled the title character and encountered many of the series' characters in a strange (but comical) world.

name: Ossuarium
summary: In medieval Bohemia, Marie and Jakub struggle to escape a terrible curse - but their futures have already been written.

name: Osteotic Bypass
summary: the holy art of getting your entire skeleton to the other side

name: Oshiya! Push!
summary: Take on the role of Isamu Takao, Oshiya Extraordinaire, in fast-paced arcade game Oshiya! Push!

name: OSgrid
summary: None-profit developer grid for Open Simulator where anyone may connect their own OS virtual regions for social use and gaming.

name: Oscar the Balloonist: Drops Into the Country Side
Oshare Princess
summary: The first game in the Oshare Princess fashion game series.

name: Ossan Kyoushi no Joshikousei Tsuma ga Yarichin Danshi ni Netorareru Hanashi
summary: A visual novel from α-MODEL.

name: Osakabe
summary: Osakabe is a first-person horror experience set in a haunted Japanese Castle. You'll need to struggle, run and hide to escape from Osakabe's fierce grasp. You'll explore your surroundings to find out about Osakabe's past and use your limited tools to turn the tides in your favor. You may also find familiar faces along the way that guide your path, but only if Osakabe doesn't find you first...

name: Osu!Droid
summary: Osu!Droid is a fan-made recreation of osu! for Android devices, initially developed by Pesets and neico, later maintained by a group of fans in Baidu Tieba and on GitHub under the name osu!droid Team.

name: Oscar Wilde Card
summary: He loves dinner parties. He loathes you. An amusing card game.

name: Oscar Mike VR
summary: Oscar Mike VR is a fast paced 5-on-5 FPS game for the Vive. Players can play as the International Special Forces or the Fifth Column. OM:VR features realistic maps and weapons that make the players feel immersed in the action.

name: Osy Osmosis
summary: Osy Osmosis is a fun game for all ages where you must help Osy stay safe as she navigates through her world collecting stars. To help Osy, you will use osmosis to keep her in balance with the world around her.

name: Oshare Princess 5
summary: Oshare Princess 5 is an Adventure game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Oscar's World Tour
summary: The lastest game in the "Oscar" series of platformers for DSiWare

name: Oshiri Tantei: Pupu Mirai no Meitantei Toujou!
summary: Oshiri Tantei: Pupu Mirai no Meitantei Toujou! is an adventure game that faithfully reproduces the original book and TV animation, so that anyone from children to adults can easily enjoy it. A polite and meticulous super sleuth known as the Butt Detective solves a myriad of baffling mysteries, blowing raspberries in the face of crime.

name: O Sombrio: A Voz das Almas
summary: O Sombrio: A Voz das Almas is a Brazilian horror game where you take on the role of Amir, a professor at the Center for the Study of Natural Phenomenons. After coming into contact with a book called Sinister Sapiens, you become cursed with something that will make you realize the existence of what many cannot see, hear, or feel. In the story, you'll find letters, documents, and telegrams, which will help understand what happened to you and to many in that town.

name: Oscar & Gems: Puzzle Quest
summary: Play the new mach3. Beware of food with spikes and eyes!

name: Oshare Princess DS: Oshare ni Koishite!
summary: The first DS installment of the Oshare Princess series.

name: Osylla
summary: Osylla is a horror game based on real events. Try to escape from your own house and help your mother to get medical help. Are you able to help everyone in the household?

name: Os Encolhidos
summary: Os Encolhidos is a web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Osada
summary: Weird musical click-and-follow game from the makers of Machinarium.

name: Osmos+
summary:
Enter the Darwinian world of a galactic mote. Grow by absorbing smaller motes—but beware of being absorbed yourself.
Osmos+ features unique physics-based play, stellar graphics, and a hypnotic ambient soundtrack.
Navigate through floating playgrounds, competitive petri dishes, deep solar systems, and more.
The key is to balance mass and movement: to propel yourself you must eject matter behind you, causing you to shrink. Use it wisely.
Whether you're a child at heart who likes mucking about with single-cell organisms, or a strategist with a physics degree, this game is for you.

name: O Seresteiro
summary:
In this musical adventure for all ages, the Seresteiro will go from Oiapoque to Chuí on a journey through Brazil, in search of the band that will stand up to his rival, the monster Romildo.

On his way he will face challenges and defeat enemies, spreading happiness through his singing.

name: Oswald's Supermarket
summary:
An arcade game based on a supermarket. Oswald, a shop assistant, is not too pacient and will be annoyed if you organize the products of the supermarket badly.
Win points, multiplicators and do not end being mad!

name: Os Trapalhões apresentam Didi na Mina Encantada!
summary: Regional re-release of Pick Axe Pete based on Didi Mocó, one of the characters of the Brazilian comedy group, Os Trapalhões.

name: Ostrofa
summary:
Be prepared to survive in a custom-generated, low poly environment, fighting against 
other players from all over the world

name: Ostatni Dzien w Pracy
summary: Arcade, simulation, logical, rpg maker.

name: Oshare Princess 2 + Doubutsu Kyaranabi Uranai
summary: Oshare Princess 2 + Doubutsu Kyaranabi Uranai is a Miscellaneous game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Oshioki Kirai! 2
summary: Oshioki Kirai! 2 is a humorous arcade-style action game where players control a constantly running character attempting to escape a giant human trying to kill them. In each stage, the player must dodge comical opponents using household items, like chopsticks or dirty napkins, by moving left and right to avoid three potential hits. Surviving long enough leads to the opponent's defeat and stage completion.

name: Oscar the Balloonist Dives into the Lake
Oshikake Petit Lily
summary:
A short 20-30 minute fully voiced Girl x Girl visual novel, where you come in contact with your crazily cute childhood friend.
May include some disturbing depictions including blood, mental illness and suicide.

Nozomi is currently recovering from clinical depression at home. Her eccentric childhood friend Puchiri comes to check on her, but their relationship may suddenly take an unexpected turn...

name: Oshidashi Zintrick
summary:
An unlicensed port of Oshidashi Zintrick/Zentrix, a Neo Geo CD exclusive title, to the Neo Geo AES and MVS.

Once every four years in Asgard, the "Zintrick Tournament" is held. During this time, all four corners of the world can enter and wealth, fame, and glory is promised for the winner. Who among the Zintrick masters will reign victorious?

name: Osyaberi! Horijyo! Gekihori: Anna Holinski Saves the Universe, Alright?!
summary: Spiral into the galaxy to save the world’s treasures – alone or with a friend!

name: Osterity
summary:
Burdensome regulations have long stymied the United Aerospace Corporation's ability to innovate in the energy sector. However, recent pro-business rulings represent a welcome change of pace, clearing the way for us to open an exciting new facility in the Lone Star State. Come on down 'n' see us sometime, y'all!

OSTERITY is a 7+1 map vanilla "mega episode" for the Doom 2 IWAD, powered by OTEX. A 3-episode, Doom 1-inspired megawad squeezed into just 7 maps. The basic formula is to alternate sprawling megamaps with short boss/challenge maps, though the rules are bent a little towards the end.

name: Oscar Wilde's The Selfish Giant
summary: A multimedia presentation of the story about a once selfish giant who welcomes children to his previously forbidden garden and is eventually rewarded by an unusual little child. The game features animation, sound, narration, and video. It offers 100 word definitions, activities, games, jigsaw puzzles, and information about trees, plants, castles, giants, seasons, and weather.

name: Osawari Tantei: Nameko Daihanshoku
summary: Touch Detective spin-off.

name: Osaka's Dream
summary: Osaka's friends have been kidnapped by a mysterious entity. Find them by looking through a whopping 1 level in this demo.

name: Oshukuju
summary: This is the story of curse and blessing hidden under a bloodline. Tamako wakes up to see an unfamiliar ceiling. She seeks an escape from the mansion, through traces of distorted feelings. “Novel-to-Experience” Adventure Horror.

name: Osteya
summary:
Osteya - the city which once was home to many people over the centuries.
According to historians, there is a legend that Osteya stuck in time between worlds.

name: Oscura
summary: Tablet/phone game.

name: Oscar in Toyland 2
summary: Oscar returns to Toyland.

name: Osiris
summary: Dark history about Osiris corporation, which perform experiments in the field of teleportation of human souls to the Heaven on the artificial planet G6. Inspired by Dark Dubstep music.

name: OSP Entertainment Complete Archive
summary: A CD or digital download collecting all OSP Entertainment games released, as well as some bonus goodies.

name: Osmium
summary: A horizontal scrolling shoot'em up written by Alastair Darren Watts and published by The Power House for the Commodore 64.

name: OS:Path
summary:
Small but tricky indie game to spend your evening on playing.
You'll have to determine the cause of a program's critical error and restore its modules by playing mini games and solving puzzles while using the console.

name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: A Lenda do Santuário - Cosmo Cards
summary: Take on epic battles against the Gold and Bronze Saints in an exciting Card Game!

name: Osman Gazi
summary: Osman Gazi 3D RPG Game

name: Osawari Hockey Enko-chan
summary: Hit the ball and make the girl feel goodIt's a game where you play a ball like air hockey and hit a girl to enjoy her reaction.Hit the part where the girl feels and fill the sensitivity gauge to move to the next scene.

name: Osiris
summary: In a world of peace and tranquility, the fight of Bloxburg vs Cubeton turns violent! A brave adventurer goes on a long journey through the world of Bloxville to fight for the return to peace and tranquility.

name: Oscar in Toyland
summary: The sequel to the 1993 platformer "Oscar".

name: Oscura: Second Shadow
summary:
Classic platforming meets modern design in a game built and optimised for touch controls.

Enter Oscura, our highly unlikely hero. He is the keeper of the lighthouse, and possesses a mysterious eternally glowing hand. Oscura must travel the lands and gather the shards to restore the Aurora stone - before it is too late and darkness befalls on the whole universe.

name: Oslo: 2084
summary: In OSLO:2084, hack your way through a dystopian world where AI rules supreme and democracy is a distant memory. As Embla, fight for freedom and change the course of history in this thrilling cyberpunk adventure.

name: Os doze trabalhos de Jongo
summary: A Sokoban clone released built-in Master System consoles by Tec toy.

name: Oshare Princess DS: Oshare ni Koishite! 2
summary: The second DS installment of the Oshare Princess series.

name: Osminog Adventures: The Lost Island
summary:
Dive into the fantastical world of Karawark and accompany the Pirate Crew of The Osminog on an adventure they were not prepared for.
Exploration Sailing Party-Based RPG RPG

name: Osomatsu-san The Game: Hachamecha Shuushoku Advice - Dead or Work
summary: An Osomatsu-san game for Vita.

name: Oshare Princess DS: Oshare ni Koishite! 2 Plus
summary: Adds new art and added scenario and dress up items.
